# saros.structure

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/NIFU-NO/saros.structure/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/NIFU-NO/saros.structure/actions/workflows/R-CMD-check.yaml)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of saros.structure is to simplify setting up social science research projects.

## Installation

You can install the development version of saros.structure from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("NIFU-NO/saros.structure")
```

## Usage

For now, only a Norwegian website shows how to use the package: https://saros.nifu.no/
